pages.text:
April 2025 County of Marin EMS GPC 1
CANCELLATION OF ALS RESPONSE
Indication
On duty, on-scene, EMS/Fire and/or Law Enforcement personnel have determined
there is no need for additional resources.
On-duty, on scene, EMS/Fire personnel may CANCEL
the response of additional resources under the following
conditions:
• Unable to locate the patient
• Patient meets criteria for BLS determination of death
• Patient does not meet any criteria for ALS transport as
outlined in ATG 4
On-duty, on scene, Law Enforcement personnel may
CANCEL the response of additional resources under the
following conditions:
• Unable to locate the patient
• Patient meets criteria for BLS determination of death (BTG 2)
SPECIAL CONSIDERATIONS
Following an appropriate evaluation and vital signs, an on-scene paramedic
may determine that the patient does not require ALS transport and request
the services of a BLS resource for transport. See protocol ATG 4.
